lu.uni.geko.joinpointdetection.drools
Class DroolsBridge

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.joinpointdetection.drools.DroolsBridge

public final class DroolsBridge
extends Object

A utility class encapsulating access to the API of the drools plug-ins.

(Note that it is disputable whether this class conforms to the bridge pattern as we are currently only providing one implementation and the "abstractions" can be regarded as low-level.)

Constructor Summary
private DroolsBridge()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

Method Detail

detectJoinpoints

public static void detectJoinpoints(String pcRules,
                                    Iterable<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> baseMIteratable,
                                    ArrayList<ArrayList<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>> baseEObjectsPerMatchLists,
                                    ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> pcIDsPerMatchLists)
Detects join points conforming to the pointcut (given as drools rules) within the base model (given as iterable) and stores the results in the lists of lists for matched EObjects and their IDs.

Parameters:
pcRules - the pointcut in form of a string representation of drools rules
baseMIteratable - an iterable access to the base model
baseEObjectsPerMatchLists - a list containing a list of matched base elements for each matched join point
pcIDsPerMatchLists - a list containing lists that contain the IDs of the matched base elements for each matched join point

prepareKnowledgeSession

private static org.drools.runtime.StatelessKnowledgeSession prepareKnowledgeSession(org.drools.io.Resource droolsRulesResource)
Prepares a stateless knowledge session for the given drools rules resource.

Parameters:
droolsRulesResource - a resource for drools rules
Returns:
the created knowledge session
